title: br: add metrics tikv_log_backup_pending_initial_scan to grafana panel
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?

Metrics of `tikv_log_backup_pending_initial_scan ` is displayed in grafana panel by default as in our document https://docs.pingcap.com/tidb/stable/br-monitoring-and-alert.

### What did happened?

It's not there, we have to added it manually.
